tool_description: Sends notifications to customers via multiple channels about shipping updates, delays, and resolutions.

notification_type.description: Type of notification (delay, exception, resolution, delivery_update)

channels.description: Communication channels to use (email, sms, push, phone, in_app)

include_tracking_link.description: Whether to include tracking link in notification

error_messages: Invalid customer ID: Customer not found in the system.
Unsupported notification type: Use one of (delay, exception, resolution, delivery_update).
Invalid channels: Use supported channels (email, sms, push, phone, in_app).
Message too long: Message content must be under 1000 characters.
Customer preferences conflict: Customer has opted out of selected communication channels.
usage: Provide customer_id, notification_type, message_content, and preferred channels. Set urgency_level for prioritization. The tool sends notifications and returns delivery status.

delivery_status.description: Delivery status for each channel (sent, failed, pending)

customer_response.description: Customer response or acknowledgment if available
